Event Calendar

ART + NATURE 2025

Eternal Construction:
Photographic Perspectives
on Southern California’s Built Environment 

September 20, 2025 - January 18, 2026 

Eternal Construction brings together artists from Laguna Art Museum’s permanent collection who have engaged deeply with themes of urbanization, infrastructure, environmental transformation and conceptual interpretations of space. Through stark realism, conceptual play and aesthetic manipulation, these artists reveal the ever-evolving story of Southern California’s relationship with land.

Explore

YOUR MEMBERSHIP

Make it Your Museum

Become a member!

Support the art you love and join a growing group of members who value creativity, culture and community! Members get: Unlimited admission, exclusive experiences, special discounts, inclusion in our inner circle of LAM supporters and more.
